displayProperties.name: Masked Mayhem
displayProperties.description: While wearing a Festival mask, complete dungeons, raids, Master or Grandmaster Nightfalls, or win rounds in the Trials of Osiris.

displayProperties.name: Season's Greetings
displayProperties.description: Defeat targets with the Seasonal weapon from this Season. Defeating Guardians grants more progress.

displayProperties.name: Occult Ritual
displayProperties.description: Complete ritual activities, including strikes, Crucible matches, and Gambit matches.

displayProperties.description: Earn Candy from activities.

displayProperties.name: Sweet Tooth
displayProperties.description: Collect Candy by completing activities and defeating combatants while wearing a Festival mask.

displayProperties.name: Masked Bandit
displayProperties.description: Complete Crucible or Gambit matches while wearing a Festival mask.

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants with Pulse Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Grasp of Avarice Solo Flawless

displayProperties.name: Heads Will Roll
displayProperties.description: Defeat Headless Ones in Haunted Sectors.

displayProperties.name: One of Many
displayProperties.description: Defeat all the Headless Ones in a single run of a Haunted Sector.

displayProperties.name: Savior of the Deep

displayProperties.name: Happy Haunting Ground
